name: Neverwinter Nights: Kingmaker
summary:
In a party with a cowardly Wererat, a scarred Nymph, an exiled Rakshasa, and a quick-tempered Azer, you seem to be the only normal one... but are you? Embark on a journey to face your nemesis outside the embattled ramparts of the Keep of Cyan. It  
is a journey that will test your loyalties and cause you to question the very bounds of life and death. 

Evil lurks in the war-torn keep and it's up to you to unearth it. To learn the truth, you must win the throne.
